item.description:
Men, Sex and Honesty
Father Peter Bowes
Friday, June 19 • 7:30 p.m.

The myth of male sexual ‘needs’ and prowess have caused endless heartaches for women and children. Using the body to indulge sensual pleasures is done at the expense of those being used for this purpose. The male drive for sex is really driven by unresolved feelings that need expression and undeveloped skills in relating through interpersonal communication. Come and learn the right relationship of men to their feelings, sexuality, communication, and commitment.

Suggested Donation: $25

http://sites.google.c...
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Seminar: Men, Sex and Honesty
